page.title: 11THE FARMING YEAR
page.content: {SPRING:}In the spring the farmers let out most of their stock to graze the grass.On some farms nearly all the cows calve in the spring but on others they calve all the year round. {SUMMER:}In the summer the farmers have all their sheep out.In early June the farmer makes his first crop of silage and a little later he does his haymaking.A second cut of silage is taken later still,after fertilizer has been applied to the grass fields.Most of the sheep farmers dip and drench their sheep to protect them from fies. A lot of cattle farmers spray and fly tag their cattle. {AUTUMN:}In early Autumn the corn is harvested and when it gets wet and cold the cows are housed in Cubicle houses and fed on silage and hay.Winter corn is planted. {
